saveC(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.userPListController
An event handler to handle the save the caption event, save the caption to the photo
search(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.userPListController
An event handler to handle the search event, open up a new window for search
searchByDate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.searchViewController
An event handler to handle the search by date event
searchByTag(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.searchViewController
An event handler to handle the search by tag event
searchViewController - Class in controller
Search by date or by tag, search among all the photo the user has
searchViewController() - Constructor for class controller.searchViewController
 
setCaption(String, boolean) - Method in class model.imgR
Set the caption field of the image
setCopied(boolean) - Method in class model.imgR
Change the iscopied value of the image, change to true means this image is copied, false means it is not
setName(String) - Method in class model.album
Take the input string and set the name to the input strinig
setSelect(album) - Method in class controller.userAlbumController
select a certain album and display the changes on the lisview
setStage(Stage) - Method in class controller.photoViewController
store the stage of this controller
start(Stage, userlist) - Method in class controller.adminController
Start the stage by filled list with data
start(Stage) - Method in class controller.loginController
Set up the stage and load data from the disk
start(Stage) - Method in class controller.Photos
start the whole program
start(album, int) - Method in class controller.photoViewController
start the GUI by filling in data
start(Stage, albumList) - Method in class controller.searchViewController
Start the GUI and the controller by filling in the stage it is on and the albumlist it can perform search later
start(Stage, userlist, int) - Method in class controller.userAlbumController
set up the GUI and the controller by filling in the stage it is on, the userlist and the index of which user logs in
start(Stage, userlist, albumList, album, int) - Method in class controller.userPListController
start the GUI and the controller by filling the following data
switchAction(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.searchViewController
An event handler to handle the switch event, switch between search by date and search by tag

An event handler to handle the switch event, switch between add and edit button
